column4: My last distro was Arch.  I used it to learn as much as I could about linux without pulling my brain out of my head and eating it
I must be thinking of something else then.
One thing I do notice about running in linux for a short time
my laptop gets about as hot as windows + games
I'm wondering if my video driver isn't being detected properly
This is a laptop, so it's the mobility card
if it's detecting the desktop card... could it be soft modding the card and heating it up?
check that acpi is running, it controls fans also
but it seems that acpi is running
you can also get info with more /proc/acpi/*
/var/log/XF86.log.0 or something like that has everything that X uses
couldnt remeber and too lazy to check :)
it could be that it doesnt have proper acceleration yet
maybe you could call dells support to ask for linux drivers :D
